Open Source Contributions

Learn through sharing

  • Contribution #1

Open source is how I learned to program. It provided me with countless volumes of reading material, a wealth of projects looking for a learning hand, and a stage to present myself and listen to criticism.

It's only right that I give back to the community that made me.
